org.openflow.protocol
Class OFMessage

java.lang.Object
  org.openflow.protocol.OFMessage
Direct Known Subclasses:
OFBarrierReply, OFBarrierRequest, OFEchoRequest, OFError, OFFeaturesReply, OFFeaturesRequest, OFFlowMod, OFFlowRemoved, OFGetConfigRequest, OFHello, OFPacketIn, OFPacketOut, OFPortMod, OFPortStatus, OFStatisticsMessageBase, OFSwitchConfig, OFVendor
public class OFMessage
extends java.lang.Object

The base class for all OpenFlow protocol messages. This class contains the equivalent of the ofp_header which is present in all OpenFlow messages.

Author:
David Erickson (daviderickson@cs.stanford.edu) - Feb 3, 2010, Rob Sherwood (rob.sherwood@stanford.edu) - Feb 3, 2010
